document_data.name: The Respected Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Respected Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Respected''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|2122}}
document_data.Activities: This large [[mamluk]] organization had a long and proud history of serving [[Muluk]], the City of Kings. They were bitter rivals with some of the mamluk organizations from [[Qudra]], including the [[Dutiful Mamluk Society]].
document_data.Organization: The Respected were led by General [[Oman Abd al-Hazim]]
document_data.Base of Operations: The Respected operated out of Muluk in north Zakhara. They had a presence in all of the [[Free Cities of Zakhara]].
